spell_tooltip.description: Each second while Stealth is active, nearby enemies within 12 yards take an additional 2% damage from you for 10 sec. Stacks up to 6 times.
Casting Envenom with at least 5 combo points on a target afflicted by your Garrote, Rupture, and lethal poison deals 61,547 Nature damage, and reduces their movement speed by 90% for 2 sec.
Cheap Shot grants Slice and Dice for 15 sec and Kidney Shot restores 10 Energy per combo point spent.

Attack with your poisoned blades, dealing 428,247 Physical damage, dispelling all enrage effects and applying a concentrated form of your active Non-Lethal poison.

Your Nature damage done to the target is increased by 30% for 8 sec.

Awards 1 combo point.
Blinds all enemies near the target, causing them to wander disoriented for 18 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect. Limit 1.
Provides a moment of magic immunity, instantly removing all harmful spell effects. The cloak lingers, causing you to resist harmful spells for 5 sec.
Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.
Blind has 50% reduced cooldown, 70% reduced duration, and applies to all nearby enemies.
Shadowstep has 1 additional charge.
Increases the non-damaging effects of your weapon poisons by 20%.
Fatal attacks instead reduce you to 7% of your maximum health. For 3 sec afterward, you take 85% reduced damage. Cannot trigger more often than once per 6 min.
Redirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next damaging attack within the next 30 sec and lasting 6 sec.
Energy cost of Feint and Crimson Vial reduced by 10.
Reduces the cooldown of Sprint by 60 sec.
Movement speed increased by 15%.
Increases the healing you receive from Crimson Vial, healing potions, and healthstones by 25%.
Sprint increases movement speed by an additional 30% and has 4 sec increased duration.
The Energy costs of Kidney Shot, Cheap Shot, Sap, and Distract are reduced by 20%.
Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 21% chance of poisoning the enemy, reducing their damage by 3.6% for 10 sec.
Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.
Feint has 1 additional charge.
Increases the critical strike chance of your attacks that generate combo points by 5%.
Auto-attacks increase auto-attack damage and movement speed by 1.0% for 3 sec, stacking up to 10%.
Ambush generates 1 additional combo point.
Adds a Leeching effect to your Lethal poisons, granting you 7% Leech.
Slice and Dice heals you for up to 1% of your maximum health per 3 sec.
Your finishing moves have a 10% chance per combo point to grant 1% Haste for 15 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Increases your maximum Energy by 100 and Energy regeneration by 10%.

Shiv supercharges 2 combo points.

Damaging finishing moves consume a supercharged combo point to function as if they spent 2 additional combo points.

Restore 100 Energy. Mastery increased by 13.6% for 6 sec.

When your Energy is reduced below 30, drink a Thistle Tea.
Increase the bonus granted when a damaging finishing move consumes a supercharged combo point by 1.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.

Coats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 21% chance to poison the enemy for 163,017 Nature damage over 12 sec. Subsequent poison applications will instantly deal 17,453 Nature damage.
Shiv now also increases your Nature damage done against the target by 30% for 8 sec.

You regain 8 Energy each time your Garrote or Rupture deal Bleed damage to a poisoned target.

If an enemy dies while afflicted by your Rupture, you regain energy based on its remaining duration.
Increases maximum Energy by 100.
Envenom's effect increases the damage of Envenom by 10%.
Garrote and Rupture damage increased by 15%.
Critical strikes with attacks that generate combo points grant an additional combo point per critical strike.
Kidney Shot and Rupture also apply Internal Bleeding, dealing up to 260,581 Bleed damage over 6 sec, based on combo points spent.
Shiv deals 100% increased damage and has 1 additional charge.
Carve a deathmark into an enemy, dealing 694,905 Bleed damage over 16 sec. While marked your Garrote, Rupture, and Lethal poisons applied to the target are duplicated, dealing 100% of normal damage.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.
Ambush and Mutilate cost 10 more Energy and deal 70% additional damage as Nature.
Increases the damage of your weapon poisons by 10%.
Your weapon poisons, Nature damage over time, and Bleed abilities deal 2% increased damage to targets for each weapon poison, Nature damage over time, and Bleed effect on them.
Garrote increases the damage of Ambush and Mutilate on the target by 20%.

Coats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 21% chance to poison the enemy, dealing 17,859 Nature damage and applying Amplifying Poison for 12 sec. Envenom can consume 10 stacks of Amplifying Poison to deal 35% increased damage. Max 20 stacks.
Envenom duration increased by 2 sec. Envenom can now overlap 2 times.
Mutilate deals an additional 20% Bleed damage over 8 sec.
Ambush and Mutilate have a 15% chance to make your next Ambush free and usable without Stealth. Chance increased to 30% if the target is under 35% health.
Shiv deals 200% increased damage and no longer costs Energy.
Envenom's effect also increases the critical strike chance of your weapon poisons by 5%, and their critical strikes generate 1 Energy.

Prepare a Serrated Bone Spike every 30 sec, stacking up to 3. Rupture spends a stack to embed a bone spike in its target.

 Serrated Bone Spike:
Deals 201,107 Physical damage and 34,413 Bleed damage every 2.7 sec until the target dies or leaves combat.

Refunds a stack when the target dies.

Awards 1 combo point plus 1 additional per active bone spike.
Your Poisons and Bleeds deal 30% increased damage to targets below 35% health.
Envenom has a 8% chance per combo point spent to smash a vial of poison at the target's location, creating a pool of acidic death that deals 309,172 Nature damage over 2 sec to all enemies within it.

Release a lethal poison from your weapons and inject it into your target, dealing 588,027 Nature damage instantly and an additional 400,935 Nature damage over 14 sec. 

Each time you apply a Lethal Poison to a target affected by Kingsbane, Kingsbane damage increases by 20%, up to 1,000%.

Awards 1 combo point.
You may apply 1 additional Lethal and Non-Lethal Poison to your weapons, but they have 30% less application chance.

Ambush from Stealth applies 3 stacks of Deathstalker's Mark to your target. When you spend 5 or more combo points on attacks against a Marked target you consume an application of Deathstalker's Mark, dealing 237,006 Plague damage and increasing the damage of your next Ambush or Mutilate by 50%.
You may only have one target Marked at a time.
Your next Fan of Knives after applying Deathstalker's Mark deals an additional 197,505 Plague damage and generates 1 additional combo point.
Auto-attacks against Marked targets deal an additional 49,376 Plague damage.
Damage dealt to targets other than your Marked target deals 5% Plague damage to your Marked target.
Your damaging abilities against enemies above 20% health have a very high chance to apply Fatal Intent. When an enemy falls below 20% health, Fatal Intent inflicts 37,998 Plague damage per stack.
Rupture deals an additional 4,937 Plague damage each time it deals damage, stacking up to 10 times. Rupture duration increased by 3 sec.
After Deathmark expires, gain 30 sec of 30% increased Nature damage.

Evasion reduces magical damage taken by 20%. 

Cloak of Shadows reduces physical damage taken by 20%.
If you have critically struck with Fan of Knives, increase the critical strike chance of Fan of Knives and Black Powder by 15% and critical strike damage by 32% for 12 sec.
Each time you consume a stack of Deathstalker's Mark, reduce the cooldown of Shadowstep by 3 sec.

When you consume the final Deathstalker's Mark from a target or your target dies, gain 40 Energy and your next Envenom cast with maximum combo points is guaranteed to critically strike, deals 60% additional damage, and applies 3 stacks of Deathstalker's Mark to the target.

Attack with your poisoned blades, dealing 429,314 Physical damage, dispelling all enrage effects and applying a concentrated form of your active Non-Lethal poison.

Your Nature damage done to the target is increased by 30% for 8 sec.

Awards 1 combo point.
Blinds all enemies near the target, causing them to wander disoriented for 18 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect. Limit 1.
Provides a moment of magic immunity, instantly removing all harmful spell effects. The cloak lingers, causing you to resist harmful spells for 5 sec.
Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.
Blind has 50% reduced cooldown, 70% reduced duration, and applies to all nearby enemies.
Shadowstep has 1 additional charge.
Increases the non-damaging effects of your weapon poisons by 20%.
Evasion also reduces damage taken by 20%, and Feint also reduces non-area-of-effect damage taken by 20%.
Redirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next damaging attack within the next 30 sec and lasting 6 sec.
Energy cost of Feint and Crimson Vial reduced by 10.
Reduces the cooldown of Sprint by 60 sec.
Movement speed increased by 15%.
Increases the healing you receive from Crimson Vial, healing potions, and healthstones by 25%.
Sprint increases movement speed by an additional 30% and has 4 sec increased duration.
The Energy costs of Kidney Shot, Cheap Shot, Sap, and Distract are reduced by 20%.
Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 21% chance of poisoning the enemy, reducing their damage by 3.6% for 10 sec.
Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.
Feint has 1 additional charge.
Increases the critical strike chance of your attacks that generate combo points by 5%.
Auto-attacks increase auto-attack damage and movement speed by 1.0% for 3 sec, stacking up to 10%.
Ambush generates 1 additional combo point.
Adds a Leeching effect to your Lethal poisons, granting you 7% Leech.
Your finishing moves have a 10% chance per combo point to grant 1% Haste for 15 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
You are healed for 30% of your maximum health over 6 sec after activating Vanish.
Increases your maximum Energy by 100 and Energy regeneration by 10%.

Abilities requiring Stealth can be used for 6 sec after Stealth breaks.

Combat benefits requiring Stealth persist for an additional 6 sec after Stealth breaks.

Restore 100 Energy. Mastery increased by 13.6% for 6 sec.

When your Energy is reduced below 30, drink a Thistle Tea.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.
Vanish has 1 additional charge.

Coats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 21% chance to poison the enemy for 163,017 Nature damage over 12 sec. Subsequent poison applications will instantly deal 17,864 Nature damage.
Shiv now also increases your Nature damage done against the target by 30% for 8 sec.

You regain 8 Energy each time your Garrote or Rupture deal Bleed damage to a poisoned target.

If an enemy dies while afflicted by your Rupture, you regain energy based on its remaining duration.
Increases maximum Energy by 100.
Envenom's effect increases the damage of Envenom by 10%.
Garrote and Rupture damage increased by 15%.
Fan of Knives has 10% increased critical strike chance and its critical strikes always apply your weapon poisons.
Critical strikes with attacks that generate combo points grant an additional combo point per critical strike.

Using Mutilate on a target afflicted by your Rupture and Deadly Poison applies Caustic Spatter for 10 sec. Limit 1.

Caustic Spatter causes 40% of your Poison damage dealt to splash onto other nearby enemies, reduced beyond 5 targets.
Garrote deals 50% increased damage and has no cooldown when used from Stealth and for 6 sec after breaking Stealth.

Finishing move that slashes all enemies within 10 yards, causing victims to bleed. Lasts longer per combo point.

Deals extra damage when multiple enemies are afflicted, increasing by 20% per target, up to 100%.

Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

   1 point  : 308,108 over 6 sec
   2 points: 386,918 over 8 sec
   3 points: 465,729 over 10 sec
   4 points: 544,539 over 12 sec
   5 points: 623,349 over 14 sec
   6 points: 702,159 over 16 sec
   7 points: 780,970 over 18 sec
Shiv deals 100% increased damage and has 1 additional charge.
Carve a deathmark into an enemy, dealing 694,905 Bleed damage over 16 sec. While marked your Garrote, Rupture, and Lethal poisons applied to the target are duplicated, dealing 100% of normal damage.
While above 50% of maximum Energy your Garrote, Rupture, and Crimson Tempest consume 2 Energy to duplicate 30% of any damage dealt.
Critical strike chance increased by 20% while Stealthed and for 6 sec after breaking Stealth.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.
Your weapon poisons, Nature damage over time, and Bleed abilities deal 2% increased damage to targets for each weapon poison, Nature damage over time, and Bleed effect on them.
Garrote increases the damage of Ambush and Mutilate on the target by 20%.
Mutilate deals an additional 20% Bleed damage over 8 sec.
Ambush and Mutilate have a 15% chance to make your next Ambush free and usable without Stealth. Chance increased to 30% if the target is under 35% health.
Garrote damage increased by 20%. Garrote generates 2 additional combo points when used from Stealth.

Prepare a Serrated Bone Spike every 30 sec, stacking up to 3. Rupture spends a stack to embed a bone spike in its target.

 Serrated Bone Spike:
Deals 199,283 Physical damage and 34,413 Bleed damage every 2.7 sec until the target dies or leaves combat.

Refunds a stack when the target dies.

Awards 1 combo point plus 1 additional per active bone spike.
Your Poisons and Bleeds deal 30% increased damage to targets below 35% health.
Each enemy afflicted by your Rupture increases your Agility by 4%, up to a maximum of 20%.
Shiv strikes 7 additional nearby enemies and increases your Bleed damage done to affected targets by 30% for 8 sec.
Garrote and Rupture apply to 2 additional nearby enemies when used from Stealth and for 6 sec after breaking Stealth.

Bleed damage increased by 15%.

Targets below 35% health instantly bleed out and take fatal damage when the remaining Bleed damage you would deal to them exceeds 150% of their remaining health.
Your next Fan of Knives after applying Deathstalker's Mark deals an additional 197,505 Plague damage and generates 1 additional combo point.
Auto-attacks against Marked targets deal an additional 49,376 Plague damage.
Damage dealt to targets other than your Marked target deals 5% Plague damage to your Marked target.
Your damaging abilities against enemies above 20% health have a very high chance to apply Fatal Intent. When an enemy falls below 20% health, Fatal Intent inflicts 37,998 Plague damage per stack.
Rupture deals an additional 4,937 Plague damage each time it deals damage, stacking up to 10 times. Rupture duration increased by 3 sec.
After Deathmark expires, gain 30 sec of 30% increased Nature damage.

Evasion reduces magical damage taken by 20%. 

Cloak of Shadows reduces physical damage taken by 20%.
Fan of Knives and Black Powder deal 30% additional damage while 2 or more enemies are afflicted with Rupture.
Each time you consume a stack of Deathstalker's Mark, reduce the cooldown of Shadowstep by 3 sec.

When you consume the final Deathstalker's Mark from a target or your target dies, gain 40 Energy and your next Envenom cast with maximum combo points is guaranteed to critically strike, deals 60% additional damage, and applies 3 stacks of Deathstalker's Mark to the target.

Redirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next damaging attack within the next 30 sec and lasting 6 sec.
Energy cost of Feint and Crimson Vial reduced by 10.
Reduces the cooldown of Sprint by 60 sec.
Movement speed increased by 15%.
Increases the healing you receive from Crimson Vial, healing potions, and healthstones by 25%.
Sprint increases movement speed by an additional 30% and has 4 sec increased duration.
The Energy costs of Kidney Shot, Cheap Shot, Sap, and Distract are reduced by 20%.
Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 21% chance of poisoning the enemy, reducing their damage by 3.6% for 10 sec.
Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.
Feint has 1 additional charge.
Increases the critical strike chance of your attacks that generate combo points by 5%.
Auto-attacks increase auto-attack damage and movement speed by 1.0% for 3 sec, stacking up to 10%.
Ambush generates 1 additional combo point.
Adds a Leeching effect to your Lethal poisons, granting you 7% Leech.
Slice and Dice heals you for up to 1% of your maximum health per 3 sec.
Your finishing moves have a 10% chance per combo point to grant 1% Haste for 15 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Increases your maximum Energy by 100 and Energy regeneration by 10%.

Shiv supercharges 2 combo points.

Damaging finishing moves consume a supercharged combo point to function as if they spent 2 additional combo points.

Restore 100 Energy. Mastery increased by 13.6% for 6 sec.

When your Energy is reduced below 30, drink a Thistle Tea.
Increase the bonus granted when a damaging finishing move consumes a supercharged combo point by 1.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.

Coats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 21% chance to poison the enemy for 163,017 Nature damage over 12 sec. Subsequent poison applications will instantly deal 17,421 Nature damage.
Shiv now also increases your Nature damage done against the target by 30% for 8 sec.

You regain 8 Energy each time your Garrote or Rupture deal Bleed damage to a poisoned target.

If an enemy dies while afflicted by your Rupture, you regain energy based on its remaining duration.
Increases maximum Energy by 100.
Envenom's effect increases the damage of Envenom by 10%.
Garrote and Rupture damage increased by 15%.
Critical strikes with attacks that generate combo points grant an additional combo point per critical strike.

Using Mutilate on a target afflicted by your Rupture and Deadly Poison applies Caustic Spatter for 10 sec. Limit 1.

Caustic Spatter causes 40% of your Poison damage dealt to splash onto other nearby enemies, reduced beyond 5 targets.
Shiv deals 100% increased damage and has 1 additional charge.
Carve a deathmark into an enemy, dealing 694,905 Bleed damage over 16 sec. While marked your Garrote, Rupture, and Lethal poisons applied to the target are duplicated, dealing 100% of normal damage.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.
Ambush and Mutilate cost 10 more Energy and deal 70% additional damage as Nature.
Increases the damage of your weapon poisons by 10%.
Your weapon poisons, Nature damage over time, and Bleed abilities deal 2% increased damage to targets for each weapon poison, Nature damage over time, and Bleed effect on them.
Garrote increases the damage of Ambush and Mutilate on the target by 20%.

Coats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 21% chance to poison the enemy, dealing 17,880 Nature damage and applying Amplifying Poison for 12 sec. Envenom can consume 10 stacks of Amplifying Poison to deal 35% increased damage. Max 20 stacks.
Envenom duration increased by 2 sec. Envenom can now overlap 2 times.
Mutilate deals an additional 20% Bleed damage over 8 sec.
Ambush and Mutilate have a 15% chance to make your next Ambush free and usable without Stealth. Chance increased to 30% if the target is under 35% health.
Shiv deals 200% increased damage and no longer costs Energy.
Envenom's effect also increases the critical strike chance of your weapon poisons by 5%, and their critical strikes generate 1 Energy.

Prepare a Serrated Bone Spike every 30 sec, stacking up to 3. Rupture spends a stack to embed a bone spike in its target.

 Serrated Bone Spike:
Deals 200,451 Physical damage and 34,413 Bleed damage every 2.7 sec until the target dies or leaves combat.

Refunds a stack when the target dies.

Awards 1 combo point plus 1 additional per active bone spike.
Your Poisons and Bleeds deal 30% increased damage to targets below 35% health.
Envenom has a 8% chance per combo point spent to smash a vial of poison at the target's location, creating a pool of acidic death that deals 300,927 Nature damage over 2 sec to all enemies within it.

Release a lethal poison from your weapons and inject it into your target, dealing 588,027 Nature damage instantly and an additional 400,935 Nature damage over 14 sec. 

Each time you apply a Lethal Poison to a target affected by Kingsbane, Kingsbane damage increases by 20%, up to 1,000%.

Awards 1 combo point.
You may apply 1 additional Lethal and Non-Lethal Poison to your weapons, but they have 30% less application chance.
Your next Fan of Knives after applying Deathstalker's Mark deals an additional 197,505 Plague damage and generates 1 additional combo point.
Auto-attacks against Marked targets deal an additional 49,376 Plague damage.
Damage dealt to targets other than your Marked target deals 5% Plague damage to your Marked target.
Your damaging abilities against enemies above 20% health have a very high chance to apply Fatal Intent. When an enemy falls below 20% health, Fatal Intent inflicts 37,998 Plague damage per stack.
Rupture deals an additional 4,937 Plague damage each time it deals damage, stacking up to 10 times. Rupture duration increased by 3 sec.
After Deathmark expires, gain 30 sec of 30% increased Nature damage.

Evasion reduces magical damage taken by 20%. 

Cloak of Shadows reduces physical damage taken by 20%.
If you have critically struck with Fan of Knives, increase the critical strike chance of Fan of Knives and Black Powder by 15% and critical strike damage by 32% for 12 sec.
Each time you consume a stack of Deathstalker's Mark, reduce the cooldown of Shadowstep by 3 sec.

When you consume the final Deathstalker's Mark from a target or your target dies, gain 40 Energy and your next Envenom cast with maximum combo points is guaranteed to critically strike, deals 60% additional damage, and applies 3 stacks of Deathstalker's Mark to the target.
